slogan: From shadow to light, discover your ideal vehicle
privacyPolicyMessage: Lumina Auto collects your name, address, phone number, and images to promote vehicles and improve app functionalities. These data are protected and will only be shared with third-party services anonymously to enhance the service.
welcomeAdminMessage: Welcome to Lumina Auto. Our privacy policy details the information collected, how it's used, protected, and disclosed. Whether you're a buyer or a seller, Lumina Auto provides an inclusive platform to quickly find car deals without unnecessary travel. Log in, chat with our Lumina experts, and explore a convenient and efficient way to sell or buy your next car. You strictly forbid selling illegal or unlawfully held vehicles. By selling a vehicle through Lumina Auto, you agree to pay a commission to the Lumina Auto team.
privacyPolicyContent: At Lumina Auto, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you use the Lumina Auto application and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
informationCollectionDescription: When you use Lumina Auto, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.
informationUsageDescription: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to:
informationUsageNotifyChanges: Inform you of changes to our service
informationUsageTrackUsage: Track and analyze usage of our service
informationUsageDetectIssues: Detect, prevent, and address technical issues
tapToAccept: Tap "Agree and Continue" to accept our
accessApplicationAgreement: By accessing the Lumina Auto application, you agree to be bound by these terms of use.
sellVehicleAgreement: When you sell a vehicle via Lumina Auto, you agree to pay a commission to the Lumina Auto team.
vehicleSaleRestrictions: You are strictly prohibited from selling vehicles that do not belong to you, are stolen, or are in any way illegal.
phoneNumberTooShort:
The phone number you entered is too short for the country: {{countryName}}.

Include your area code if you haven't.
phone_number_too_long: The phone number you entered is too long for the country: {{countryName}}.
verificationSMS: Lumina will need to verify your phone number.
usernameLengthError: A username length should be between 3 and 40 characters.
provideNameAndProfilePhoto: Please provide your name and a profile photo. We collect images to use them in user posts, conversations, and on the user's profile page.
updateComingSoonContent: We're sorry, call verification is not yet available. We are actively working to add it soon. Thank you for your understanding.
registrationAttemptText: You've tried to register with the phone number: {{phoneNumber}}. before request
locationPermissionError: To sell or discover offers in your region, please allow location access in the app settings.
alreadyOrdered: You have already requested this car!
alreadyOrdered2: You have already requested to buy this vehicle. Please check your cart.
interestMessageNewCar: Following your post, I want to express my interest in the potential purchase of the new vehicle {{carName}} model {{brand}} that you are offering. Could you please inform me if the price of {{price}} {{currency}} is negotiable or fixed? I look forward to discussing the details with you and finalizing this transaction. Thank you!
interestMessageUsedCar: Following your post, I want to express my interest in the potential purchase of the used vehicle {{carName}} model {{brand}} that you are offering. Could you please inform me if the price of {{price}} {{currency}} is negotiable or fixed? I look forward to discussing the details with you and finalizing this transaction. Thank you!
orderErrorSnackbar: Error placing order. Please try again.
confirmDeleteCarMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this vehicle? This action is irreversible
cannotDeleteReportedOrder: You cannot delete a reported purchase
confirmDeleteOrder: Are you sure you want to delete this order?
orderReportedSuccess: Your purchase has been reported as completed!
orderReportError: Sorry, there was an error reporting the purchase!
unauthorizedActionContent: You are not authorized to delete this message.
rejectedMessage: Your post of {{carName}}, model {{carModel}}, has not been approved and has been removed from our platform as it does not comply with our terms of service. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
approvalMessage: Your {{carName}} car, model {{carModel}}, priced at {{carPrice}} {{currency}}, has been approved and is now available on the platform.
alertMessage: Congratulations! Your vehicle {{carName}} has been reported as purchased by the user {{requesterName}}. We have reported this transaction for your safety.
SaledMessage: Congratulations! Your vehicle {{carName}} has been marked as sold to the user {{requesterName}}. We have reported this transaction for your safety.
confirmReportCarBoughtMessage: Are you sure you want to report this car as bought?
aboutContent: Lumina Auto is a platform that provides a convenient and efficient way to buy or sell cars. Whether you are a buyer or a seller, Lumina Auto offers an inclusive marketplace to quickly find car deals without unnecessary hassle. Connect with sellers, explore a wide range of options, and make your next car purchase or sale with ease.
ownVehicleWarning: You cannot request to buy your own vehicle.
atLeastTwoImages: Please select at least two images of the car.
durationRequired: Please provide the duration for used cars.
validPriceRequired: Please provide a valid price for the car.
noSalesYet: You haven't made any sales yet.
markAsPaidConfirmationText: Do you really want to mark this car as paid? This implies that you agree to our terms of use by paying 1.2% of the selling price to Lumina. Make sure you have made the payment using the available payment methods above to record all your transactions.
reportAsBoughtConfirmationText: By performing this action, you confirm the purchase of this vehicle from the seller. This process helps us protect you and report any sales that have taken place on our platform, ensuring the safety and transparency of your transactions.
paidMessage: Payment confirmation for the car {{carName}} model {{carModel}}, sold for {{salePrice}} {{currency}}. As per the agreed terms, {{commissionRate}}% of this amount, which is {{commissionAmount}} {{currency}}, is destined for Lumina. Please ensure the payment has been made through our available payment methods to record the transaction.
confirmMarkAsSoldMessage: Are you sure you want to mark this car as sold?
confirmPurchaseRequestMessage: Do you confirm the purchase request for this vehicle? By accepting, we will facilitate direct connection with the seller.
featureComingSoonMessage: This feature is not yet available. Our developers are actively working on developing it. We apologize for the inconvenience. For any inquiries, please contact the Lumina team via the messaging option.
imageCollectionAndUsagePurposeDescriptio: We collect images to use them in user posts, conversations, and on the user's profile page.
ConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to log out?
sensitiveDataDescription: We take the security of our users' data very seriously. All collected personally identifiable information is protected by strict security rules implemented via Firebase.
cameraAccessDescription: Permission to access the camera is requested to take photos or use related features.
locationAccessDescription: Permission to access location is requested to provide location-based features.
storageAccessDescription: Permission to access storage is requested to locally backup data or download files.
thirdPartyDescription: We use some third-party services to enhance the application and our service, including Google Play Services, Google Analytics for Firebase, and Firebase Crashlytics.
optOutDescription: You can stop any information collection by the application easily by uninstalling it. You can use the standard uninstallation processes available on your mobile device or through the mobile application market or network.
cookiesDescription: No, Lumina Auto does not use cookies. Instead, we use the shared_preferences package from Flutter to store small amounts of data locally on your device.
dataRetentionDescription: We will retain data provided by the user for as long as you use the application and for a reasonable period thereafter.
childrenDescription: The application is not intended for use by children under 13 years of age.
securityDescription: We are concerned about the privacy of your information. We provide physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect the information we process and maintain.
consentDescription: By using the application, you consent to the processing of your information as defined in this privacy policy.
contactDescription: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or data practices, please contact us at the following address: xluminaauto@gmail.com.
confirmAcceptContent: You must first accept the privacy policy and terms of use before you can use our application.
